chart.description: Number of spans dropped by the Smart Gateway
chart.name: Dropped Spans
chart.programText:
E = data('dropped_spans', filter=filter('source', 'gateway'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['reason']).publish(label='E')
F = data('dropped_spans', filter=(not filter('reason', '*')) and filter('source', 'gateway'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='F')

options.markdown:
Internal Smart Gateway Metrics

This dashboard requires turning on the sending of [Internal Gateway Metrics] (https://github.com/signalfx/integrations/tree/master/gateway#signalfx-performance-options) by setting either the `StatsDelay` parameter in your Smart Gateway configuration (self-reporting), or using `InternalMetricsListenerAddress` and the Smart Agent to collect and report Smart Gateway internal metrics. _Note that these metrics will take up some of your Custom Metrics and DPM capacity and are **not** included in your APM plan._

chart.description: Saturation of the gateway hosts (max of CPU, memory and disk utilization)
chart.name: Gateway Saturation
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('disk.summary_utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = max(A, B, C).sum(by=['host','cluster']).publish(label='D')

chart.description: Traces analyzed per minute
chart.name: TAPM

chart.description: Saturation of the selected Smart Gateway host (max of CPU, memory and disk utilization)
chart.name: Gateway Saturation
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('disk.summary_utilization', filter=filter('source', 'gateway')).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = max(A, B, C).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='D')
